OrgName: Meridian Project Systems, Inc., a Trimble Company
activities: Trimble Buildings, a part of Trimble's Engineering and Construction segment, is a world leader in technology for construction project optimization across the design-build-operate (DBO) lifecycle. Proliance is the flagship product, a Program and Project Management Tool for capital / construction projects, allowing for easy collaboration and project controls. Proliance uniquely combines project and portfolio management, facilities management, business process management and business analytics into one system of record, enabling large enterprises to track how their real estate, construction and facilities portfolios are performing.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Registered users related data via the Proliance application system or other data to transact the company business. Online, offline, and non-HR data, including manually processed data.
recoursemech:
The Better Business Bureau (BBB)will be the independent recourse mechanism for this Safe Harbor Framework.
